price: 111. Aujourd’hui, Je les récompense pour leur patience et ce sont eux les vrais gagnants.
arabic: إِنِّي جَزَيۡتُهُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: innī jazaytuhumu al-yawma bimā ṣabarū annahum humu al-fāizūna
